description:
Developed and taught by licensed Speech-Language Pathologist, Jessica Kijowski, MS, CCC-SLP, this short course is an intensive, practical introduction to The Accent Channel method of Accent Reduction and will noticeably improve the clarity of your spoken English in just 5 weeks.

The Accent Channel method has been developed through more than 15 years of experience. Thousands of native and non-native English speakers have used the method to successfully learn and convincingly use various accents and dialects.

This course is a combination of instruction and direct practice. You will be changing old habits and replacing them with new ones so active practice is required. You will work on improving the most problematic sounds and concepts that occur most frequently in English, then learn to modify your current conversational speech patterns to sound more American.

This course will not teach you to produce every sound in English and you will not sound completely American in 5 weeks, but you will learn HOW to modify your accent so that you can continue to improve and you will hear real change in the way you sound. The course will focus on the components of the American Accent that will give you the most dramatic improvement in the least amount of time.

There are no shortcuts. Daily practice is required! You will be learning a lot, but DOING is what is going to change your speech. Although it is tempting to want to rush through all the material, this course was designed as a 5-week program. You will get the best results from sticking with the schedule and practicing just a little every day.

After taking this course, you will understand why people have accents, how accents affect communication, have the tools to continue to improve and practice on your own, and best of all, you will speak more clearly and be more easily understood any time you are speaking English.
title: Accent Reduction in 5 Weeks:  An Intensive Action Plan
